name: Titor's Time Traveling Tale
description:
Step into the shoes of a medieval physicist studying the theory of time travel in "Titor's Time Traveling Tales," the VR escape room game. While conducting experiments on a strange artifact, you accidentally activate it and find yourself transported to a server room in the distant future.

Dive into this Demo VR Escape Room game where you must do a series of puzzles/activities to continue. Find the mystery behind your untimely traveling and

Use your VR headset and controllers to navigate around the world to solve simple puzzles. Pull levers, push buttons, and find various objects to complete objectives given to continue.

Assets used in the game:

Medieval Level: Omni Studio
Server Room: iPoly3D
Dark Room: Meshtint Studio
